results.content:
If you want to see an overall picture of building an app using Express, this is a great course. It gives you a pretty good overall picture of the process. 

If you want to have a deep understanding of how all the pieces work together, you won't if you don't have some good knowledge of JavaScript and Node.js

I am going to come back to this course as my JS & Node.js knowledge increases.
results.content_html:
If you want to see an overall picture of building an app using Express, this is a great course. It gives you a pretty good overall picture of the process.

If you want to have a deep understanding of how all the pieces work together, you won't if you don't have some good knowledge of JavaScript and Node.js

I am going to come back to this course as my JS & Node.js knowledge increases.
